statements.statement:
create table core.schema_version ( version_lock char(1) not null default 'X', version_number bigint not null,
constraint check_lock_primary primary key (version_lock), constraint check_lock_locked check (version_lock = 'X') )

create table core.audit ( audit_time timestamp not null, audit_type varchar(64) not null, audit_arg0 varchar(256) not null, audit_arg1 varchar(256) not null, audit_arg2 varchar(256) not null, audit_arg3 varchar(256) not null )

create table core.users ( user_id char (36) not null, user_password_algo varchar (64) not null, user_password_hash varchar (64) not null, user_password_salt varchar (64) not null, user_email varchar (128) not null, user_display_name varchar (128) not null, user_locked_reason varchar (128),
constraint user_id_key primary key (user_id), constraint user_id_lower check (user_id = lower(user_id)), constraint user_id_nonzero check (user_id != '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'), constraint user_hash_lower check (user_password_hash = lower(user_password_hash)), constraint user_salt_lower check (user_password_salt = lower(user_password_salt)), constraint user_display_name_unique unique (user_display_name) )

create table core.redactions ( redaction_id bigint generated always as identity not null, redaction_user char (36) not null, redaction_time timestamp not null, redaction_reason varchar (128) not null,
constraint redaction_id_key primary key (redaction_id), constraint redaction_user foreign key (redaction_user) references core.users (user_id) )

create table core.metadata ( meta_id char (64) not null, meta_data blob (16M) not null, meta_redaction bigint,
constraint meta_id_key primary key (meta_id), constraint meta_id_lower check (meta_id = lower(meta_id)), constraint meta_redaction_reference foreign key (meta_redaction) references core.redactions (redaction_id) )

create table core.data ( data_id char (64) not null, data_data blob (128M) not null, data_redaction bigint,
constraint data_id_key primary key (data_id), constraint data_id_lower check (data_id = lower(data_id)), constraint data_redaction_reference foreign key (data_redaction) references core.redactions (redaction_id) )

create table core.page_revisions ( revision_id bigint generated always as identity not null, revision_meta_id char (64) not null, revision_data_id char (64) not null,
constraint revision_id primary key (revision_id), constraint revision_meta_id_ref foreign key (revision_meta_id) references core.metadata (meta_id), constraint revision_data_id_ref foreign key (revision_data_id) references core.data (data_id) )

create table core.pages ( page_id char (36) not null, page_revision bigint not null,
constraint page_id_key primary key (page_id), constraint page_id_lower check (page_id = lower(page_id)), constraint page_revision_ref foreign key (page_revision) references core.page_revisions (revision_id) )
